Class ControllerProperty

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.ControllerProperty
Direct Known Subclasses:
AsciiDeviceProperty, ASN1Object, AxisProp, CanogaProperty, CapProperty, CBWProperty, ClearGuideProperty, CParkProp, DinRelayProperty, DR500Property, E6Property, G4Property, IncFeedProperty, ManchesterProperty, MndotProperty, MsgFeedProperty, OnvifProp, Org815Property, PelcoDProperty, SS105Property, SS125Property, STCProperty, TdcProperty
public abstract class ControllerProperty extends Object
A controller property is one element of a CommMessage. It represents a property which can be queried from or stored to a controller.
Author:
Douglas Lau
